class movies.models.Movie(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

Model representing a movie in the system.

title

The title of the movie.

Type:

str

description

A brief description of the movie.

Type:

str

release_date

The release date of the movie.

Type:

date

genre

The genre of the movie.

Type:

str

rating

The movie’s rating between 0.0 and 5.0.

Type:

float

cast

A list of actors in the movie.

Type:

list

director

The director of the movie.

Type:

str

class movies.serializer.MovieSerializer(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: ModelSerializer

Serializer for the Movie model. Validates that the rating is between 0.0 and 5.0. and serializes all fields.
